quote: They only use you because you happen to be in front of them when they need to buy or sell.
why_clipworthy: It challenges the notion that trust is the primary reason clients choose agents.
suggested_hook: Why being top of mind is more crucial than trust in real estate.

quote: Your expectations are the cause of almost all your disappointments.
why_clipworthy: Encourages listeners to reassess their expectations to reduce stress.
suggested_hook: How your expectations might be sabotaging your success.
